citations.narrative:
Room # 1 has bare wood on the support frames and walls of the large enclosure. Primary enclosures for guinea pigs must
be constructed of smooth materials that are impervious to moisture and liquids. Bare wood on guinea pig enclosures must
be sealed, replaced, or covered with a material that is impervious to moisture so that surfaces can be readily cleaned and
sanitized. Correct by May 20, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Room # 1 has bare wood on the support frames and walls of the large enclosure. Primary enclosures for guinea pigs must 
be constructed of smooth materials that are impervious to moisture and liquids. Bare wood on guinea pig enclosures must 
be sealed, replaced, or covered with a material that is impervious to moisture so that surfaces can be readily cleaned and 
sanitized. Correct by May 20, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
